Overview

 

With the toolbox functions and Cplex Class API, you can model and solve a variety of mathematical programing problems.

Toolbox functions
The toolbox functions provide the ability to solve a wide variety of mathematical programming problems.

Cplex Class API
The Cplex Class API provides the ability to solve and modify a wide variety of mathematical programming problems.
